import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import sampleIcon from '../../../assets/images/default.png' import AdminJobItem from '../AdminJob/AdminJobItem' import { fetchApiData } from "../../../api/api"; const openModal = () => { let modal = document.getElementsByClassName('modal-job')[0]; modal.style.display = 'block'; } const closeModal = () => { let modal = document.getElementsByClassName('modal-job')[0]; modal.style.display = 'none'; } const AdminCustomJob = () => { const [type, setType] = useState('full time'); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [fetchState, setFetchState] = useState(true); const [jobData, setJobData] = useState([]); const fetchCategory = async () => { const response = await fetchApiData(`loadJob`) setJobData(response.data.company) } useEffect(() => { setFetchState(false); fetchCategory() console.log(jobData) }, [fetchState]) return (

Job

{/* */}
) } export default AdminCustomJob
